original_title: Jカップと噂の美人上司と出張先ホテルがまさか相部屋になるなんて…
overview: A career woman who is rumored to be beautiful, preeminent in style, and has a J-cup bust size. Such a female section chief and a male subordinate decide to go on a business trip alone. And by mistake, the accommodation hotel becomes a shared room for two people. When the normally perfect boss gets tipsy at the end of work and is so tense that he can see the cleavage of the abundant breasts, the desires of his subordinates who can see it explode! An unequaled night that continues to be lustful for a beautiful boss until morning begins!
title: My Beautiful Lady Boss Is Rumored To Have J-Cup Titties, And When We Took A Business Trip Together, To My Surprise, We Ended Up Sharing A Room Too... Lala Anzai
